title: Investigate broken iOS Nightly builds
body:
We are seeing Nightly builds failing since 14th of January ([#1814](https://ci.status.im/job/status-react/job/nightly/1814/)).

The failures show this in logs:

```
▸ Processing Info.plist
▸ Running script 'Bundle React Native code and images'
▸ Running script 'Run Script'
▸ Running script '[CP] Copy Pods Resources'

❌ error: Build input file cannot be found: '/Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app/StatusIm' (in target 'StatusIm' from project 'StatusIm')


The iOS deployment target 'IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET' is set to 8.0, but the range of supported deployment target versions is 9.0 to 14.3.99. (in target 'boost-for-react-native' from project 'Pods')
The iOS deployment target 'IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET' is set to 6.0, but the range of supported deployment target versions is 9.0 to 14.3.99. (in target 'OpenSSL-Universal' from project 'Pods')
The iOS deployment target 'IPHONEOS_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET' is set to 8.0, but the range of supported deployment target versions is 9.0 to 14.3.99. (in target 'CocoaLibEvent' from project 'Pods')
** ARCHIVE FAILED **


The following build commands failed:
        CopySwiftLibs /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app
(1 failure)
[14:13:51]: Exit status: 65
```

This is most probably related to one of the upgrade to XCode 12 and React-Native 63: https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/abac5247bf0bfb2688efbf4082a28f1d21b969cd

Interestingly enough PR builds are working just fine:
https://ci.status.im/job/status-react/job/prs/job/ios/view/change-requests/job/PR-11655/
https://ci.status.im/job/status-react/job/prs/job/ios/view/change-requests/job/PR-11656/

It's worth noting that after https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/abac5247bf0bfb2688efbf4082a28f1d21b969cd the removal of `ReactNativeConfig` was reverted in https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f28f479256c50a9533d13ef499c0b93f1680a445.

The main differences between PR builds and Nightly builds are:

* Use of [`.env.nightly`](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/.env.nightly) instead of [`.env.pr`](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/.env.pr)
* Use of different [App name and ID](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/329182fdbe0c2d18b6b9c026c43094dd9581bd99/fastlane/Fastfile#L109-L110)

My guess would be that the issue is caused by either changes to `ios/Podfile` or `ios/StatusIm.xcodeproj/project.pbxproj`.
And as expected the manual build fails the same way: https://ci.status.im/job/status-react/job/manual/89/

If I look at `/Users/jenkins/Library/Logs/gym/StatusIm-StatusIm.log` I can see this:
```
CopySwiftLibs /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app (in target 'StatusIm' from project 'StatusIm')
    cd /Users/jenkins/workspace/status-react/combined/mobile-ios/ios
    export CODESIGN_ALLOCATE\=/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/codesign_allocate
    export DEVELOPER_DIR\=/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer
    export SDKROOT\=/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS14.3.sdk
    builtin-swiftStdLibTool --copy --verbose --sign EB660E4143E17539455941F0057E1E108C83D73E --scan-executable /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app/StatusIm --scan-folder /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app/Frameworks --scan-folder /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app/PlugIns --scan-folder /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS14.3.sdk/System/Library/Frameworks/MessageUI.framework --scan-folder /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/iPhoneOS.platform/Developer/SDKs/iPhoneOS14.3.sdk/System/Library/Frameworks/Social.framework --scan-folder /Users/jenkins/workspace/status-react/combined/mobile-ios/modules/react-native-status/ios/RCTStatus/Statusgo.framework --platform iphoneos --toolchain /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain --destination /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app/Frameworks --unsigned-destination /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/BuildProductsPath/SwiftSupport --strip-bitcode --strip-bitcode-tool /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/bitcode_strip --emit-dependency-info /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/IntermediateBuildFilesPath/StatusIm.build/Release-iphoneos/StatusIm.build/SwiftStdLibToolInputDependencies.dep
error: Build input file cannot be found: '/Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app/StatusIm' (in target 'StatusIm' from project 'StatusIm')
```
@flexsurfer can you tell me what changes did you do in our XCode project to get the `ios/StatusIm.xcodeproj/project.pbxproj` changes I can see in https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11642?

If I look under `/Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app/` I can see that there is no `StatusIm` folder or file in there:
```
administrator@macos-03.ms-eu-dublin.ci.misc:~ % ls -l /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/InstallationBuildProductsLocation/Applications/StatusIm.app/        
total 21200
drwxr-xr-x   4 jenkins  jenkins      128 Jan 18 16:00 AccessibilityResources.bundle
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins     1710 Jan 18 16:06 AppIcon60x60@2x.png
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins     2176 Jan 18 16:06 AppIcon76x76@2x~ipad.png
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   125471 Jan 18 16:06 Assets.car
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins     3184 Jan 18 16:06 Info.plist
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   254684 Jan 18 16:06 Inter-Bold.otf
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   261392 Jan 18 16:06 Inter-BoldItalic.otf
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   254904 Jan 18 16:06 Inter-Italic.otf
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   253376 Jan 18 16:06 Inter-Medium.otf
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   260728 Jan 18 16:06 Inter-MediumItalic.otf
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   244440 Jan 18 16:06 Inter-Regular.otf
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   254024 Jan 18 16:06 Inter-SemiBold.otf
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   261132 Jan 18 16:06 Inter-SemiBoldItalic.otf
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins   346876 Jan 18 16:06 InterStatus-Regular.otf
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins        8 Jan 18 16:06 PkgInfo
drwxr-xr-x  11 jenkins  jenkins      352 Jan 18 16:05 QBImagePicker.bundle
drwxr-xr-x  31 jenkins  jenkins      992 Jan 18 16:05 TOCropViewControllerBundle.bundle
drwxr-xr-x   5 jenkins  jenkins      160 Jan 18 16:11 assets
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins    10055 Jan 18 16:06 embedded.mobileprovision
drwxr-xr-x   5 jenkins  jenkins      160 Jan 18 16:06 launch-image-universal.storyboardc
-rw-r--r--   1 jenkins  jenkins  8290257 Jan 18 16:11 main.jsbundle
```
Here's an attempt at fixing a nightly by Andrey by removing the `arm64` architecture as suggested above: https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11658
and now for some reason we have reactnativeconfig error back on PR builds https://ci.status.im/job/status-react/job/prs/job/ios/job/PR-11658/1/consoleText
And here's a manual nightly type build from #11658: https://ci.status.im/job/status-react/job/manual/93/
ok , same error as for PR build, and @vkjr saying it's fixed for him just by re-adding reactnativeconfig library locally

Aaaaand it fails with:
```
The following build commands failed:
	CompileC /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/IntermediateBuildFilesPath/ReactNativeConfig.build/Release-iphoneos/ReactNativeConfig.build/Objects-normal/armv7/ReactNativeConfig.o /Users/jenkins/workspace/status-react/combined/mobile-ios/node_modules/react-native-config/ios/ReactNativeConfig/ReactNativeConfig.m normal armv7 objective-c com.apple.compilers.llvm.clang.1_0.compiler
	CompileC /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/StatusIm-gzbepwnrlqbukxbmmpfskimspfch/Build/Intermediates.noindex/ArchiveIntermediates/StatusIm/IntermediateBuildFilesPath/ReactNativeConfig.build/Release-iphoneos/ReactNativeConfig.build/Objects-normal/arm64/ReactNativeConfig.o /Users/jenkins/workspace/status-react/combined/mobile-ios/node_modules/react-native-config/ios/ReactNativeConfig/ReactNativeConfig.m normal arm64 objective-c com.apple.compilers.llvm.clang.1_0.compiler
(2 failures)
[09:17:32]: Exit status: 65
```

https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/a19859ea76d97326a72a39a16448dd538e494df4 this commit "fixed" the issue, but as you can see there are no changes in it, just random number changed (timestamp?)
so it seems like re-adding reactnativeconfig library changes something on the machine , because next time fresh repo builds fine
it seems it makes changes in `~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/`

Based on this error:
```
CompileC /Users/jenkins/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/.../ReactNativeConfig.m normal armv7 objective-c com.apple.compilers.llvm.clang.1_0.compiler
```
I found this comment:

>Integration the react-native-config through a cocoapods fixed the problem
https://github.com/invertase/react-native-firebase/issues/1667#issuecomment-463246823
Looks like https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/11658 is a working fix.
